title: The Fire Opal
description: THEY CALLED HER GUARDIAN OF THE FIRE OPAL.A Cajun woman ran from her voodoo roots as a child and is now returning for her mother's funeral. Her high school sweetheart has also come back, seeking the killer of his brother. The pair is soon swept into a perilous chase for the magical fire opal, the only means of destroying the powerful demon lurking in the bayou. If she fails, the world will fall into darkness. If she wins, her worst nightmare will come to pass. She will become the next guardian of the fire opal, a curse she'll pass on to all her generations to come.
author: Connie Flynn
